column4: Right now the two main programs I'm really struggling with are Call of Duty 4 and Ragnarok Online.
any errors? what is wrong with them?
Call of Duty 4 keeps giving me direct x errors. Ragnarok Online will launch the patcher, but it always freezes (on a private server by the way).
i have to go, but check this out. http://perceptualmotion.co.uk/linux/cod4-wine.pdf
